introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Roulette is a classic game from a French word meaning little wheel which uses one small ball and roulette wheel. So to win this simple game you just have to guess in what number the ball will land.

rules.title: rules
steps: The game starts when the dealer opens the time for betting.
Now you have to place your bet on the betting panel we provide.
All bets in the betting panel will be accepted automatically when the time is up.
After the betting time ends, the Dealer will spin the roulette wheel to determine the outcome of the game.

The result for one round of the game is just one number consisting of numbers 0 to 36 only, and if the ball is not positioned clearly then a "no game" status will occur and the dealer will spin the roulette wheel one more time until the result is clear.

single.title: Straight/Single
single.winning-conditions: The result is one number you bet

split.title: Split
split.winning-conditions: The result is 1 of the 2 adjacent numbers you bet

street.title: Street
street.winning-conditions: The result is 1 of the 3 adjacent numbers you bet

corner.title: Corner/Square
corner.winning-conditions: The result is 1 of the 4 adjacent numbers you bet

six-line.title: Six Line/Double Street
six-line.winning-conditions: The result is 1 of the 6 adjacent numbers you bet

trio.title: Trio/Basket
trio.winning-conditions: The result is 1 of the 3 adjacent numbers you bet

column-bet.title: Column Bet
column-bet.winning-conditions: The result is in the "Column" you bet

dozen-bet.title: Dozen Bet
dozen-bet.winning-conditions: The result is in the "Dozen" you bet

odd.title: Odd
odd.winning-conditions: The result is an odd number

even.title: Even
even.winning-conditions: The result is an even number

racetrack-bet.title: Racetrack Bet
racetrack-bet.description: Racetrack Bet is a feature for players to quickly place various betting numbers simultaneously. The betting panel in Racetrack mirrors or is the same as that on the roulette wheel. Next, we will explain the various types of bets that you can make in this feature.
racetrack-bet.instructions: Use the button according to the image to access this Racetrack Bet.

side-bet.name: Side-by-Side Betting
side-bet.description: This bet includes the number to the left or right of the main number you choose on the roulette wheel. This side-by-side bet only exists in Racetrack mode. To determine how far you want to bet at the same time, you can use the + - button on the left of the Racetrack Panel. There are 1 to 9 chips that you can choose from in this side-by-side bet.
side-bet.example: For example, if you choose just 1 chip, then automatically the left or right side of the number you choose on the roulette wheel will be filled with 1 chip.
